bibl.title: The Architectural Decoration of Marina el-Alamein. An Analysis and Catalogue of the Late Hellenistic and Roman Decorative Architectural Features of the Town and Cemetery
bibl.seg: Rafał Czerner, The Architectural Decoration of Marina el-Alamein. An Analysis and Catalogue of the Late Hellenistic and Roman Decorative Architectural Features of the Town and Cemetery = BAR International Series. 1942.
Oxford, Archaeopress, 2009, 4°, xii-132 pp., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-14073-0422-9. £33.
